Item ID10937

Nail beast nails are used to make Sanfew serums. The only source of these nails are nail beasts. A nail beast hits 3 times per attack, so one can be very dangerous. Nail beasts come in groups of 3-5 during a random encounter in the Temple Trekking minigame.

[[File:Nail beast nails detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Nail beast nails''' are used to make [[Sanfew serum]]s. The only source of these nails are [[nail beast]]s. A nail beast hits 3 times per attack, so one can be very dangerous. Nail beasts come in groups of 3-5 during a random encounter in the [[Temple Trekking]] [[minigame]].
